title: League of Legends MCP Server
description:
MCP server for AI-powered League of Legends game analysis. Connect to Claude Desktop to analyze your matches and get improvement recommendations.

## Setup Guide

### Step 1: Get Riot API Key
1. Go to https://developer.riotgames.com
2. Log in with your Riot account
3. Copy your Development API key (expires every 24h)
4. For production, apply for a Personal or Production key

### Step 2: Configure this Actor
1. Add your Riot API key below or as secret env variable `RIOT_API_KEY`
2. Set your default region
3. Save and Build

### Step 3: Enable Standby Mode
1. Go to Actor Settings > Standby
2. Set Idle timeout to 3600 seconds
3. Note your Standby URL

### Step 4: Connect Claude Desktop
1. Open Claude Desktop > Settings > Connectors
2. Add Custom Connector
3. URL: `https://<username>--lol-mcp-server.apify.actor/mcp?token=<apify-token>`

### Example Prompts
- "Analyse mes 10 dernières parties"
- "Quels sont mes points faibles ?"
- "Compare mes stats sur Jinx vs Caitlyn"
- "Montre ma progression ce mois-ci"
